basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium, Sarcina Lutea.Fungi (SMF-, SMF+):Alternaria brassicola (IC50=2.5, 1.5 µg/ml), Ascockyta pisi (IC50=1, 10 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=3, 7 µg/ml), Colletotrickum lindemutkianum (IC50=1.5, 1.5 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (IC50=6, 10 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum fsp. pisi (IC50=3.5, 4 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum fsp. lycopersici (IC50=3, 10 µg/ml),Nectria haematococca (IC50=3.5, 7 µg/ml),Phoma betae (IC50=1.5, 7 µg/ml), Pyrenopkora tritici-repentis (IC50=3, 3.5 µg/ml), Pyricularia oryzae (IC50=3, 7 µg/ml), Verticillium dahliae (IC50=0.25, 0.5 µg/ml).[NOTE:SMF- = Synthetic growth Medium with low ionic strength; SMF+ = Synthetic growth Medium supplemented with with 1 mM CaCl2, 50 mM KC1]
